name: Package Rush V2.0
description:
You are the truck that starts at the bottom left of your screen.

Your goal is to get the highest score possible by delivering packages to house, but you must not run out of fuel, you can refuel at the station which is at the bottom right but once you have used it takes 3 delivered package to be able to go again. If your fuel is low and your package is to far you can drop it off at the drop off to take another. You must deliver that package later.The signes are closed roads which you must go around.

Use the arrow keys to move. The arrow shows where you must go. You need to wait for the sound to know you have the package and dropping off.

Good Luck
